Berenguer Sánchez, A
Aguilar, E
Pascual Mateo, C
Santos Arrontes, D
Luján Galán, M
Gómez de Vicente, J M
metadata.dc:description: We presented a case of inferior vena cava on the left side diagnosed by abdominal CT scan during the study of a renal cell carcinoma in the right side. This anomaly is very rare but it may suppose a more difficult approach to the nephrectomy.
metadata.dc:title: Vena cava renal izquierda en un paciente con carcinoma de células renales.
[Left inferior vena cava with renal cell carcinoma].
